Title: Microsoft Teams:  Specify who can manage the screen in Teams Town hall
Description:
A new option in Town hall lets Organizers designate who can manage the screen shown to attendees during the event. Organizers can select specific individuals who will be able to start the event, manage what attendees see, and end the event, ensuring a smoother and more organized event experience. Available on Teams desktop app and coming soon for Teams Rooms on Windows.
GA date: May CY2025
